title: QUANTUM HYPNOSIS: Magnetism & Presence / Q&A with Dr Paret
description:
Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in non-verbal hypnosis. He will explain more about Quantum hypnosis regarding magnetism and presence. The quantistic elements in non-verbal hypnosis create a deep trance state. Dr. Paret shares that there is a very important concept in Quantum science. It is the influence of the observer. With non-verbal hypnosis we can connect with nature, the universe and our deepest selves. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
